channel.title: Long Time Listener, Last Time Caller - July 31, 9PM EDT
channel.description:
*Long Time Listener, Last Time Caller* - July 31st, 9:00 PM EDT
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LjSlBRYwwDFzS6XZtO9
Hangouts On Air dies on the first of August; let’s rage against the dying of the light.
This session is scheduled for a maximum of 3 hours and will be recorded to share if all players consent. General RSVPs begin on July 17, 2019 at 6:00 PM EDT.
This is a short one-shot freeform game about a talk radio show at the end of the world. Players collaboratively create a cataclysm during the course of play, and the conventions of radio are gradually abandoned in favor of moments of genuine human connection. This game is inspired by spontaneous moments of transcendent radio.

item.title: Long Time Listener, Last Time Caller - July 31, 9PM EDT
item.dc:creator: @Shawn
item.description:
@Shawn wrote:

That was a really rewarding game! Especially the stories in the last act, but everything from the setup onward added to it. I’m grateful for the chance to have played!

Read full topic
item.source: Long Time Listener, Last Time Caller - July 31, 9PM EDT
